channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Enjoy Social Feed plugin for WordPress website
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Enjoy Social Feed plugin for WordPress website

item.title: CVE-2024-0779|2024-03-18T19:05:42.163Z -- Unknown -- Enjoy Social Feed plugin for WordPress website
item.description: The Enjoy Social Feed plugin for WordPress website WordPress plugin through 6.2.2 does not have authorisation and CSRF in various function hooked to admin_init, allowing unauthenticated users to call them and unlink arbitrary users Instagram Account for example

item.title: CVE-2024-0780|2024-03-18T19:05:41.368Z -- Unknown -- Enjoy Social Feed plugin for WordPress website
item.description: The Enjoy Social Feed plugin for WordPress website WordPress plugin through 6.2.2 does not have authorisation when resetting its database, allowing any authenticated users, such as subscriber to perform such action
